name: She Must Survive
description:
You control a woman who has to live her last minutes in an old manor.
You will follow her through many cameras disposed in every room.
Discover this beautiful place and enjoy this heavy atmosphere!

Controls :

z, q, s, d or directionnal arrows to move the woman

Hold Shift to run

Ctrl to crouch

Spacebar in front of a switch to turn on/off the lights of the current room

Escape to exit

------------------------ CAUTION : Required configuration --------------------

i80286 with at least 16 MHz

1024 Ko RAM

A VGA screen

Mono speaker

Keyboard with at least the keys "z, q, s, d, ctrl, escape"

200 Mo disk capacity

Stable electrical installation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
